rules_text:
Rhapsody {4}{U}{U} [i](Pay {4}{U}{U} to cast this as a 4/4, or as a sorcery to make it become a 4/4.)[/i]
When Unstable Prophet enters, surveil X, where X is its power. [i](To surveil X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Unable to contain its power, it is ripped at every edge but is still a masterpiece.[/i]
